org.bson

Class BasicBSONEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bson.BasicBSONEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BSONEncoder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultDBEncoder

    public class BasicBSONEncoder
extends Object
implements BSONEncoder
    this is meant to be pooled or cached there is some per instance memory for string conversion, etc...

      • _put

        @Deprecated
protected void _put(byte type,
                   String name)
        Deprecated. This method is NOT a part of public API and will be dropped in 3.x versions. Access buffer directly via getOutputBuffer() if you need to change how BSON is written.
        Encodes the type and key.

      • _putValueString

        @Deprecated
protected void _putValueString(String s)
        Deprecated. This method is NOT a part of public API and will be dropped in 3.x versions. Access buffer directly via getOutputBuffer() if you need to change how BSON is written. Otherwise override putString(String, String).
